meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a grandmother.
meanings.sent1: My bubbie always bakes delicious cookies for me.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my bubbie on weekends.
meanings.sent3: When my bubbie tells stories, she makes me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of my bubbie is a treasure to our family.
meanings.sent5: The warm hugs from my bubbie feel like sunshine on a rainy day.

meanings.definition: A round, soft, and chewy Jewish bread roll.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating a fresh bubbie with butter for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The bubbie at the bakery smells so good!
meanings.sent3: My bubbie sandwich got squished in my bag.
meanings.sent4: The bubbie on the plate looked like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent5: The bubbie melted in my mouth, leaving a delicious taste.

meanings.definition: A small, round, and shiny bubble.
meanings.sent1: The bubbie floated gently in the air.
meanings.sent2: I blew a big bubbie with my bubble wand.
meanings.sent3: The bubbie popped right in my face!
meanings.sent4: The bubbie reflected the colors of the rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The bubbie slowly rose, sparkling in the sunlight.
